ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_PASSWORD_MIN_SMALL_ALPHABATE_CHK
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Check min number of small letter alphabets
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Validate the number of lowercase characters in a password.

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_ENABLE_BIOMETRIC_AUTHENTICATION
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Enable Biometric authentication for login
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Enable Biometric authentication for login

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_PASSWORD_MIN_ALPHABATE_CHK
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Check minimum number of alphabets in password
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Validate the minimum number of alphabets in a password.

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_PASSWORD_MIN_SPECIALCHAR
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Min allowed special characters
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Specify the minimum number of special characters required in a password.

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_ALLOWED_VALID_DAYS_FOR_PASSWORD
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Valid Days of a Password
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Specify the validity period of a password.

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_NO_OF_INCORRECT_LOGIN_ATTEMPT
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Number of invalid login attempts allowed
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Specify the number of invalid login attempts allowed before lockout.

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_BIOMETRIC_THRESHOLD_SCORE
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Biometric Threshold score between false positives and false negative error rates
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Ability to set the Biometric Threshold score between false positives and false negative error rates

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_PASSWORD_MIN_ALPHABATE
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Min allowed alphabetic characters in password
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Specify the minimum number of alphabets required in a password.

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_PASSWORD_MIN_CAPITAL_ALPHABATE
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Min allowed capital letter alphabets
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Specify the minimum number of uppercase characters required in a password.

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_PASSWORD_MIN_NUMERIC
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Min allowed numeric characters
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Specify the minimum number of numerical characters required in a password.

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Min allowed password length
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Specify the minimum length of a password.

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_PASSWORD_MIN_CAPITAL_ALPHABATE_CHK
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Check min number of capital letter alphabets
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Validate the minimum number of the uppercase characters in a password.

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_PASSWORD_NOTIFY_PERIOD
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Notify period before password expiry
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Specify the notification period (in days) for password expiry.

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_PASSWORD_MIN_NUMERIC_CHK
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Check min number of numeric characters
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Validate the minimum number of numerical characters in a password.

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_PASSWORD_MIN_SPECIALCHAR_CHK
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Check min number of special characters
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Validate the minimum number of special characters in a password.

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH_CHK
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Check minimum length of password
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Validate the minimum length of a password.

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_NUMBER_OF_OLD_PASSWORD
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Min password history check
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Allows to verify the new password entered with the previous passwords to avoid duplicate entry.

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_PASSWORD_MIN_SMALL_ALPHABATE
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Min allowed small letter alphabetic characters
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Specify the minimum number of lowercase characters required in a password.

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_PASSWORD_PREV_PWD_CHK
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Check new password with old password
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Validate the new password with the previous password(s).

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_MAXIMUM_FAILED_ATTEMPS
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Configure maximum failed attempts limit
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Enter the maximum failed attempts limit
